Landmarks.name: Chinatown Heritage Centre
Landmarks.content:
Get transported back in time and experience the footsteps 
 of migrants in the late 19th century of singapore
Landmarks.contentHTML:
Chinatown Heritage Centre

*Distance Away*

Landmarks.name: Sri Maraimman Temple
Landmarks.content:
This hindu temple is the oldest 
 and largest of its kind in singapore
Landmarks.contentHTML:
Sri Maraimman Temple

*Distance Away*

Landmarks.name: Masjid Jamae
Landmarks.content:
Established in 1826 it is one of the oldest mosque in 
 singapore One of the only six in the 
 country that conducts sermons in tamil
Landmarks.contentHTML:
Masjid Jamae

*Distance Away*

Landmarks.name: Tong Heng
Landmarks.content:
Tong Heng is the oldest confectioneries. 
 Witness a story of resilience, 
 determination and resourcefulness.
Landmarks.contentHTML:
Tong Heng

*Distance Away*

Landmarks.name: Buddha Tooth Relic
Landmarks.content:
Get transported back in time and experience the footsteps 
 of migrants in the late 19th century of singapore
Landmarks.contentHTML:
Buddha Tooth Relic

*Distance Away*

Landmarks.name: Pagoda Street & Trengannu Street
Landmarks.content:
Witness murals that depict the past 
 through the eyes of singaporean artist Yip Yew Chong.
Landmarks.contentHTML:
Pagoda Street & Trengannu Street

*Distance Away*

Landmarks.name: Sago Street
Landmarks.content: Experience the street of the dead where immigrants of the past with no family lived and died
Landmarks.contentHTML:
Sago Street
